titles.title: Electing Representative Campbell to the Committees on Banking and Financial Services and International Relations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 12/27/1995--Introduced. Elects Representative Campbell of California to the following House Committees: (1) Banking and Financial Services (to rank following Representative King); and (2) International Relations.
